Pocket

Product Designer

San Francisco, CA from 2014

We’re looking for a passionate product designer to help us shape the future of Pocket. You’ll be responsible for conceptualizing, validating and designing exceptional product experiences across Pocket’s entire platform.

You should be an excellent communicator, problem solver, a self-starter and be comfortable working closely within a tight-knit team.
